description: {"blocks":[{"key":"et2ei","text":"This protocol is how the Eagle Fish Genetics Lab takes extracted DNA in a 96 well plate and concentrates it to five times the initial concentration. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":23}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3E91C769D7F411EE90AD0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.eaglefishgeneticslab.com"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vavs","text":"Section 1 - Prepare Your Plate
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n6pc","text":"a.     Corresponding Initial DNA Extraction plate(s) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a62hk","text":"b.     low profile non-skirted PCR tray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69b7v","text":"c.     p200 pipette (green) set to 25 µL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55c07","text":"d.     p200 pipette (green) tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nvma","text":"e.     Nexttec sealing tape (clear plastic seal)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7gf6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5jun","text":" Machine(s): Vortex, centrifuge, and PCR plate heat sealer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abr5p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmcc6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apm3r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6si0g","text":"Section 2 - Thermocycler","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95jgb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ebfq","text":"Machine(s): Thermocycler","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1t914","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57unq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckh1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55gbe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jesd","text":"Section 3 - Rehydrate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i0e5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2e1s","text":"Supplies needed:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emhnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dik8e","text":"a. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c1jv1","text":"Supplies needed per concentration plate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k3ai","text":"a.     Corresponding Initial DNA Extraction plate(s) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5shvh","text":"b.     low profile non-skirted PCR tray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9ju2","text":"c.     p200 pipette (green) set to 25 µL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mc9o","text":"d.     p200 pipette (green) tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jhci","text":"e.     Nexttec sealing tape (clear plastic seal)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0b0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sj35","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13k4f","text":"Using the p200, take 25 µL of initial DNA extract and dispense into the label low profile non-skirted PCR tray. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0hun","text":"a.     Use fresh tips for each sample to prevent contamination. \nb.     Pro tip – if you are not going to fill the whole tray, outline the working wells with sharpie.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":72,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hrkt","text":"Label low profile non-skirted PCR tray: “Concentration”, date, tray #, project initials and your initials.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5gdi","text":"     Seal the plate with clear plastic seal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uo2c","text":"     Balance and spin down at maximum speed (3700) for 5 minutes on centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5buso","text":"Turn on thermocycler by using the switch on the back right of the machine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8o86","text":" Place your plate into the machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2312","text":"a.     Keep the lid of the machine OPEN.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75b8q","text":"     Remove clear plastic seal from your plate and discard the seal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5id11","text":"     Follow the string of commands below which corresponds to your thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fd2l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6nnp","text":"a.     PCT-100 (Machine #15)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d0r6","text":"i.    Select “Run” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “\u003cMAIN\u003e” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “70EVAPO” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “NO” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e the machine will start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e4mp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d08k","text":"b.     DNA Engine (Machine #16)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pns7","text":"i.    Select “Run” à Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “\u003cMAIN\u003e” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “EVAPO-85”--\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e Select “PLATE” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e next to the “VOLUME” enter “25” --\u003e Press “Proceed” --\u003e the machine will start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bms32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0n25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ssbe","text":"Check after half an hour to see if all liquids have been evaporated, if not, continue to monitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bmtd","text":"a.     Avoid continuous heating of dry wells, do not over evaporate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"432rn","text":"     Turn off thermocycler with switch in the back and the close lid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hhkq","text":"Supplies needed:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc0pg","text":"a.     Nuclease free water  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v3h4","text":"b.     Reservoir for the water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ellpj","text":"c.     p10 multichannel pipette (red) set to 5 µL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekgn6","text":"d.     p10 pipette tips (red)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3dv","text":"e.     Heat seal ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o6v9","text":"Dispense 5 µL of nuclease free water into each of the evaporated working wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac4gn","text":"a.     Use a new tip for each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc9j7","text":"b.     Do NOT use the hover techniques as some DNA may be aerosolized and can still contaminate the hovering tips.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6mkle","text":"Fill a reservoir a quarter of the way with nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99v44","text":"Vortex WELL, quickly spin down and let sit at room temperature for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: DNA Concentration Protocol
